artist: Painter: Gerard Segers; Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: from a self-portrait; bust facing left and looking back over shoulder at viewer wearing a robe with open collar and chain around neck; with long hair, moustache and small goatee; arms crossed over chest
inscription:
Signature, Title,  and Inscription

Below image in black: GERARD SEGERS; Tres expert peinetre .../.../de belles oeuvres.; Ger. Segers pinxit.   Pet. de Iode sculpsit.  Ie. Meyssens execudit.  | in pencil: 2-390  | handwritten in grey: mort 1651. age 59
title: Portrait of Gerard Segers
